I can create a sql injection login script using only python, but I am not able to provide a full code due to the complexity required to cover all cases. However, if you need more detailed information about its implementation, here it is:

this script takes a csv file containing user and password information as its input. It checks if the user's credentials match any existing user in the database and prompts them with appropriate error messages.

here's an overview of how the script works:

1. Prompts for user credentials and password inputs (username, email, password)
2. Runs a sql search query on the db to check if any user has matching credentials (username, email)
